name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickRead | AI to Summarize Text on Web!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickRead is an Extension to summarize highlighted text on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight text and get it summarized

Features:
* Simple UI to get your text on the fly (Just by highlighting it)
* Supports: English, German, Arabic (Classical)
* Uses GPT-3 model
* 100% Free
*  Adjustable configuration for the responses
